extendedInfo.description: Your phone must be rooted to use this app!! Again, ROOT PERMISSION IS REQUIRED TO RUN THIS APP!A simple application to schedule reboots for your phone on a daily basis. Schedule options include; reboot, hot reboot and power down. If using hot reboot for scheduling, you must first hit the button and accept the superuser permission.App contains buttons to power your phone off, reboot, hot reboot, reboot to bootloader and reboot to recovery.App currently contains an enable/disable widget with more widgets coming soon. Also am going to be adding more scheduling options in the near future. App layout looks best on XHDPI phone displays.Options:* Reboot on button press.* Reboot to bootloader.* Reboot to recovery.* Power the phone off (shut down).* Hot reboot (reboot system, much faster than reg reboot).* Schedule time for reboot, hot reboot or shutdown.* Turn on or off reboot confirmations with button press.* Persistent notification option.* Turn on or off startup toast notifications.* Backup your schedule.* Restore schedule.Permissions:*Storage - modify/delete SD card contents: this is to backup your schedule to SDcard.*Phone calls - read phone state and identity: used to see if user is on a phone call.*System tools - automatically start at boot: this is for the app to schedule the next reboot.

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a few other reboot apps and this is the only one I tried that worked on my Droid X. It doesn\'t have multiple schedules or let you select which days it runs (it runs everyday), but if you need a reboot app that just works, this is it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working with Criskelo ROM
reviews.comment: Worked great when I was running LiquidSmooth ROM, but ever since I loaded CRISKELO ROM Note II v13.0 the scheduler lets my phone hang.  What is weird, is it works when I open the app and click on Reboot...
reviews.author: Riaan Jonker

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: Finally a scheduled reboot app that actually works.  Thanks much!
reviews.author: Braden Parker

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Working great!!
reviews.author: Jason Bobzin

reviews.title: Worked right away!
reviews.comment: This app works great! Only wish that I could turn off notifications. That one that says \"next reboot scheduled at 4pm\" I don\'t like notifications. I know when the next reboot is bc I set it up. I\'ve turned off all notifications from SuperSU, just need this one disabled and I\'d be set :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Actually shuts off phone and restarts it
reviews.comment: This makes a huge difference in how your phone responds( Speed and no lag). Start fresh each day. Set it to do a REAL reboot while your phone is charging and your sleeping.  I use cache cleaner and hot boot to speed up phone during the day but this restarts android and that\'s what you want. Its even smart. Waited for screen to go dark before it restarted my phone. A+ developer.
reviews.author: NoszerO Xray

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Merry Christmas
reviews.author: Tim Sherman

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is has been the best app for powering off/ power cycling my phone at pre set times.  Lg g2x running cm7
reviews.author: Faisal Humayun

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for, works perfectly! I\'m confident my phone will run even smoother with a daily 4AM reboot. My only request, it would nice to have a choice been daily or specific days only.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally!........
reviews.comment: ......a (timed) reboot app that actually works! I have tried 4 others that worked with screen on but froze when phone went into sleep mode. Another con-app (with a similar name and price) worked but was nothing more than a task killer masqerading as a rebooter. This is the best & only one that works. Only criticism I have is its an \"only 1 schedule\" at a time app, and that the \" hot reboot\" button kills all as there is no \"exclude\" list to allow for esential apps. Otherwise 5 stars & recommeded. Thanks dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: Having trouble with it powering off at night. Not sure why it isn\'t working. Please help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gets the job done
reviews.comment: Very adequate and useful.  2 minor problems on galaxy note: A- limited to 1 reboot per day. Can future versions enable more.  B- Normal reboot great but hot rebooting useless as wifi gets deactivated and you have to shut wifi then open it again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A customised widget to restart/shut down directly from the homescreen is what this app needs. Otherwise pretty good.
